description: {"blocks":[{"key":"4blsf","text":"This protocol is used for free-floating frozen (30-50 microns) and paraffin-embedded (10 microns) tissue sections.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5i1kb","text":"Free-floating","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ei65l","text":"PBS","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"61j7k","text":"0.3% Triton-X-100 in PBS 1x, stored at 4°C","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"83foq","text":"Normal Donkey Serum (NDS), stored at -20°C","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cettb","text":"Blocking Buffer: 10% NDS and 0.03% Triton-X-100 in PBS 1x. Diluted from 100% NDS (stored at -20°C) and 0.3% Triton-X-100. Filtered with 0.22 µM filter.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a6q4c","text":"Primary Antibody","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bc09d","text":"Secondary Antibody","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"98n4o","text":"Hoechst dye","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2n4n3","text":"Mounting medium","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f8u7e","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3hd1t","text":"Paraffin-embedded","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4fetr","text":"Deparaffinization station","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cusf2","text":"Slide rack","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5fkif","text":"Glass slide holder and tray","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9c4o6","text":"Humidity and slide incubation chamber","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b26b1","text":"Xylene","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3d1li","text":"Ethanol","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1k8iq","text":"Deionized water (diH2O)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ffcnb","text":"PBS","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eukpn","text":"Citrate buffer, pH 6.0, 10x","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eresm","text":"0.3% Triton-X-100 in PBS 1x, stored at 4°C","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"debvf","text":"Normal Donkey Serum (NDS), stored at -20°C","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4c9tg","text":"Blocking Buffer: 10% NDS and 0.03% Triton-X-100 in PBS 1x. Diluted from 100% NDS (stored at -20°C) and 0.3% Triton-X-100. Filtered with 0.22 µM filter.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7pksg","text":"Hydrophobic Barrier Pap Pen","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3hmds","text":"Primary Antibody","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fqm90","text":"Secondary Antibody","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5bb13","text":"Hoechst dye","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9n667","text":"Mounting medium","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bivvh","text":"Collect free-floating frozen tissue sections and process in a 24-well culture plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"27fvp","text":"Day 1: Wash the tissue for 3 X 5 min in PBS 1x.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7ag5h","text":"Permeabilize the tissue in 0.3% Triton-X-100 in PBS 1x for 20 min at room temperature on a rocking shaker.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3s5ce","text":"Wash the tissue for 3 X 5 min in PBS 1x.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4196d","text":"Block the tissue in Blocking Buffer for 1 hr at room temperature on the rocking shaker.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"slbb","text":"Briefly rinse the tissue in PBS 1x once.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"56ttg","text":"Prepare Primary Antibody in Blocking Buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"28h3n","text":"Incubate the tissue with Primary Antibody and transfer the plate to a refrigerator for overnight at 4°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e4ep2","text":"Day 2: Wash the tissue for 3 X 5 min in PBS 1x.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bqlvh","text":"Prepare Secondary Antibody in filtered 10% NDS in PBS 1x.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7dav3","text":"Incubate the tissue with Secondary Antibody for 1 hr at room temperature on the rocking shaker in the dark.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4rbmq","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"97d6d","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"rvv7","text":"After Secondary Antibody incubation, all procedures should be performed in the dark.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4ee61","text":"Wash the tissue for 2 X 5 min in PBS 1x.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6l0r7","text":"Incubate the tissue in Hoechst (1:2000) in PBS 1x for 10 min at room temperature on the rocking shaker.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"e05co","text":"Rinse the tissue for 2 X 5 min in PBS 1x.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dmtsc","text":"Transfer the tissue to a slide and remove solution around the tissue by Kimwipes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cmbfo","text":"Add mounting medium and put on a coverslip starting with top slowly to avoid generating any bubbles.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"859mv","text":"Gently move the coverslip and let the mounting medium cover the edge of the slide. Let it dry overnight in the dark.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9nav","text":"Day 3: Acquire imaging by a microscope.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"epk9n","text":"Process paraffin-embedded tissue sections on glass slides.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5bapo","text":"Day 1: Place the slides in a slide rack and rehydrate sections by sequential washes in a deparaffinization station:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d9sob","text":"Xylene: 2 x 5 min","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b5abg","text":"100% Ethanol: 2 x 10 min","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dltqf","text":"95% Ethanol: 10 min","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"hgrv","text":"70% Ethanol: 10 min","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b8c7t","text":"50% Ethanol: 10 min","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ail0i","text":"diH2O: 2 x 5 min","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"18p0u","text":"For antigen retrieval, dilute Citrate buffer in water to make 1x solution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3n5bd","text":"Fill a beaker with Citrate buffer 1x and place the beaker on a hot plate covered with foil. Boil the buffer to 100°C. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"er3vb","text":"After the final step of rehydration, transfer the slides from the slide rack to a glass slide holder. Place the holder in the beaker and heat the slides for 20 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c7pm5","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2mao2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"73gea","text":"Frequently monitor the temperature of Citrate buffer by a thermometer.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7u6le","text":"Take off the beaker from the hot plate and let it cool for 20 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"60j33","text":"Add PBS 1x to a glass tray. Put the glass slide holder in the tray and wash for 3 X 5 min on the rocking shaker.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aldos","text":"After PBS wash, carefully remove all the solution around the section with Kimwipes and draw a circle around the tissue with PAP pen a few times.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d9o4b","text":"Add Blocking Buffer (~200 µL) to cover the tissue without going over the PAP pen repellent border. Incubate for 2 hr at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"di1s9","text":"Prepare Primary Antibody in Blocking Buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5jtjr","text":"Remove all the Blocking Buffer around the tissue with Kimwipes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"28kk6","text":"Transfer the slides to a humidity and slide incubation chamber. Add water to bottom of incubation chamber.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"289lf","text":"Incubate the tissue with Primary Antibody (~200 µL) and transfer the chamber to cold room for overnight at 4°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fgale","text":"Day 2: Knock the slides gently on Kimwipes and dry around the tissue.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5sdop","text":"Stagger slides in the glace slide tray and wash with PBS 1x for 3 X 5 min on the rocking shaker.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"d2iie","text":"Prepare Secondary Antibody in 0.03% Triton-X-100 in PBS 1x.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d3vno","text":"After PBS wash, remove all the solution around the tissue with Kimwipes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cvnpk","text":"Transfer the slides to the humidity and slide incubation chamber. Add water to bottom of incubation chamber.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8r59f","text":"Incubate the tissue with Secondary Antibody (~200 µL) for 1 hr at room temperature in the dark.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aq2vo","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"33fcl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"btk56","text":"After Secondary Antibody incubation, all procedures should be performed in the dark.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f62pg","text":"Gently wipe off the solution around the tissue. Stagger slides in the glace slide tray and wash with PBS 1x for 2 X 5 min on the rocking shaker, covered with foil.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eug2g","text":"Remove solution around the tissue. Transfer the slides to the humidity and slide incubation chamber.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3tipc","text":"Incubate with Hoechst dye at 1:2000 dilution in PBS 1x for 10 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ctfl7","text":"Place the slides in the glace slide tray and rinse with PBS 1x for 2 X 5 min on the rocking shaker.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c40o1","text":"After the final wash, gently tap on the slides and remove all the solution around the tissue. Dry the slides onvernight in the dark.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3sfpc","text":"Day 3: Add mounting medium on the coverslip. Place the slides on the coverslip slowly to avoid generating any bubbles. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cdhrk","text":"Flip the slides with coverslip on the top. Gently move the coverslip and let the mounting medium cover the edge of the slide. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fdjph","text":"Dry the slide overnight in the dark.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"45qa2","text":"Day 4: Acquire imaging by a microscope.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Immunohistochemistry on free-floating and paraffin-embedded tissue sections
title_html: Immunohistochemistry on free-floating and paraffin-embedded tissue sections
